item.title: Quotes
item.description: Below is a list of quotes that I’ve been keeping in google tasks of all places. I felt this might be a better place. These are quotes I’ve been gathering and keeping for years to help me succinctly summarize my thoughts. This is an un ordered list for a reason. Good news, bad news, who can say You don’t need to feel good to get going; you need to get going to give your self a chance at feeling good.

item.title: About
item.description: Using my powers for good I’m a passionate software developer, that loves to explore and learn new things. Currently a Software Engineer at Foxio working in iOS, Android, Go, JS and Ruby mainly. I enjoy what I do and hope to continue exploring and honing my craft. There is nothing better than creating things that can help change the world.
